descriptionHtml:
Now in version 1.5 does not have to choose what texture you want to replace the dragons!
Added new textures for the dragons to be found in different places.
Each dragon its urs, damage to, the amount of HP.
Can meet the two new dragon!
Default dragons are not affected!
If you find an error accomplish your goal for them in the comments.

version 1.1
Changed the color of the dragon language
deteriorated sharpness of textures
white colors become darker

v1.2
Added coloring of the red dragon for the dragon earth.

v1.3
Added texture green dragon.
Look in the folder, extra

v1.3.1
Updated texture green dragon.
Added to Lod green dragon.
Added texture brown dragon.

v1.4
Added texture of a blue dragon (HD).
Added Lod for a black dragon.

v1.5
You no longer need to replace the texture of the standard dragons!
Added 9 new dragons!
All the texture resolution 4096x8192!
The new dragon is much stronger than the standard.
There are two translations for the names of the dragons in Russian and English!

installation
copy the file to Skyrim\\Data\\
Place the files by choice StrongDragonsRUS or StrongDragonsENG depending on the language of your game in the folder data!

by fashion esey.
author: esey
